original: Majjhima Nikāya 96
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Esukārīsutta
analyzed: esukārīsutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho esukārī brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha khalu esukārī brāhmaṇaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho esukārī brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho esukārī brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “brāhmaṇā, bho gotama, catasso pāricariyā paññapenti—
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ bho gotama catasso pāricariyā paññapenti

original: brāhmaṇassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti, khattiyassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti, vessassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti, suddassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇassa pāricariyam paññapenti khattiyassa pāricariyam paññapenti vessassa pāricariyam paññapenti suddassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti:
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ brāhmaṇassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: ‘brāhmaṇo vā brāhmaṇaṁ paricareyya, khattiyo vā brāhmaṇaṁ paricareyya, vesso vā brāhmaṇaṁ paricareyya, suddo vā brāhmaṇaṁ paricareyyā’ti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇam paricareyya khattiyaḥ vā brāhmaṇam paricareyya vessaḥ vā brāhmaṇam paricareyya suddaḥ vā brāhmaṇam paricareyya ati

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ brāhmaṇassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā khattiyassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti:
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇā khattiyassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: ‘khattiyo vā khattiyaṁ paricareyya, vesso vā khattiyaṁ paricareyya, suddo vā khattiyaṁ paricareyyā’ti.
analyzed: khattiyaḥ vā khattiyam paricareyya vessaḥ vā khattiyam paricareyya suddaḥ vā khattiyam paricareyya ati

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā khattiyassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ khattiyassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā vessassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti:
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ vessassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: ‘vesso vā vessaṁ paricareyya, suddo vā vessaṁ paricareyyā’ti.
analyzed: vessaḥ vā vessam paricareyya suddaḥ vā vessam paricareyya ati

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā vessassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ vessassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā suddassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti:
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇā suddassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: ‘suddova suddaṁ paricareyya.
analyzed: suddaḥ uva suddam paricareyya

original: Ko panañño suddaṁ paricarissatī’ti?
analyzed: kaḥ pana aññaḥ suddam paricarissati iti

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā suddassa pāricariyaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ suddassa pāricariyam paññapenti

original: Brāhmaṇā, bho gotama, imā catasso pāricariyā paññapenti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ bho gotama imā catasso pāricariyā paññapenti

original: Idha bhavaṁ gotamo kimāhā”ti?
analyzed: bhavam gotamaḥ kim āha ati

original: “Kiṁ pana, brāhmaṇa, sabbo loko brāhmaṇānaṁ etadabbhanujānāti: ‘imā catasso pāricariyā paññapentū’”ti?
analyzed: kim pana brāhmaṇa sabbaḥ lokaḥ brāhmaṇānaṃ etat abbhanujānāti imā catasso pāricariyāḥ paññapentu uti

original: “No hidaṁ, bho gotama”.
analyzed: na u hida bho gotama

original: “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, puriso daliddo assako anāḷhiyo. Tassa akāmassa bilaṁ olaggeyyuṁ: ‘idaṁ te, ambho purisa, maṁsaṁ khāditabbaṁ, mūlañca anuppadātabban’ti.
analyzed: seyyathā api brāhmaṇa purisaḥ daliddaḥ assakaḥ an āḷhiyaḥ tassa akāmassa bilam olaggeyyu idam te ambho purisa masam khāditabba mūlañca an uppadātabbanti

original: Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā appaṭiññāya tesaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ, atha ca panimā catasso pāricariyā paññapenti.
analyzed: evam eva kho brāhmaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ appaṭiññāya tesam samaṇa brāhmaṇāna atha ca panimā catasso pāricariyā paññapenti

original: Nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘sabbaṁ paricaritabban’ti vadāmi; nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘sabbaṁ na paricaritabban’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha brāhmaṇa sabbam paricaritabbanti vadāmi na aha brāhmaṇa sabbam na paricaritabbanti vadāmi

original: Yaṁ hissa, brāhmaṇa, paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, nāhaṁ taṁ ‘paricaritabban’ti vadāmi;
analyzed: yam hi ssa brāhmaṇa paricarato pāricariyā hetu pāpiyaḥ assa na seyyaḥ na aham tam paricaritabbanti vadāmi

original: yañca khvāssa, brāhmaṇa, paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo tamahaṁ ‘paricaritabban’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: yat ca khvā assa brāhmaṇa paricarato pāricariyā hetu seyyaḥ assa na pāpiyaḥ tam aham paricaritabbanti vadāmi

original: Khattiyañcepi, brāhmaṇa, evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ evam puccheyyu

original: ‘yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo;
analyzed: yam vā te paricarato pāricariyā hetu pāpiyaḥ assa na seyyaḥ yam vā te paricarato pāricariyā hetu seyyaḥ assa na pāpiyaḥ

original: kamettha paricareyyāsī’ti, khattiyopi hi, brāhmaṇa, sammā byākaramāno evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: kam ettha paricareyyāsi iti khattiyaḥ api hi brāhmaṇa sammā byākaramānaḥ evam byākareyya

original: ‘yañhi me paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, nāhaṁ taṁ paricareyyaṁ; yañca kho me paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo tamahaṁ paricareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat hi me paricarato pāricariyā hetu pāpiyaḥ assa na seyyaḥ na aham tam paricareyya yat ca kho me paricarato pāricariyā hetu seyyaḥ assa na pāpiyaḥ tam aham paricareyyanti

original: Brāhmaṇañcepi, brāhmaṇa …pe…
analyzed: brāhmaṇaṃ ca ipi brāhmaṇa pe

original: vessañcepi, brāhmaṇa …pe…
analyzed: brāhmaṇa pe

original: suddañcepi, brāhmaṇa, evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ evam puccheyyu

original: ‘yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, yaṁ vā te paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo;
analyzed: yam vā te paricarato pāricariyā hetu pāpiyaḥ assa na seyyaḥ yam vā te paricarato pāricariyā hetu seyyaḥ assa na pāpiyaḥ

original: kamettha paricareyyāsī’ti, suddopi hi, brāhmaṇa, sammā byākaramāno evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: kam ettha paricareyyāsi iti suddaḥ api hi brāhmaṇa sammā byākaramānaḥ evam byākareyya

original: ‘yañhi me paricarato pāricariyāhetu pāpiyo assa na seyyo, nāhaṁ taṁ paricareyyaṁ; yañca kho me paricarato pāricariyāhetu seyyo assa na pāpiyo tamahaṁ paricareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat hi me paricarato pāricariyā hetu pāpiyaḥ assa na seyyaḥ na aham tam paricareyya yat ca kho me paricarato pāricariyā hetu seyyaḥ assa na pāpiyaḥ tam aham paricareyyanti

original: Nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘uccākulīnatā seyyaṁso’ti vadāmi, na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘uccākulīnatā pāpiyaṁso’ti vadāmi;
analyzed: na āha brāhmaṇaḥ ucca akulīna tā seyyaso ti vadāmi na pana āha brāhmaṇaḥ ucca akulīna tā pāpiyaso ti vadāmi

original: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘uḷāravaṇṇatā seyyaṁso’ti vadāmi, na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘uḷāravaṇṇatā pāpiyaṁso’ti vadāmi;
analyzed: na aha brāhmaṇaḥ uḷāra vaṇṇa tā seyyasaḥ iti vadāmi na pana āha brāhmaṇaḥ uḷāra vaṇṇa tā pāpiyasaḥ iti vadāmi

original: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘uḷārabhogatā seyyaṁso’ti vadāmi, na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘uḷārabhogatā pāpiyaṁso’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na āha brāhmaṇaḥ uḷāra bhoga tā seyyaso ti vadāmi na brāhmaṇaḥ uḷāra bhoga tā pāpiyaso ti vadāmi

original: Uccākulīnopi hi, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī
analyzed: ucca akulīnaḥ api hi brāhmaṇaḥ idha ekaccaḥ pāṇa atipātī hoti adinna ādāyī hoti kāmesum icchā cārī

original: hoti, musāvādī hoti, pisuṇāvāco hoti, pharusāvāco hoti, samphappalāpī hoti, abhijjhālu
analyzed: hoti musāvādī hoti pisuṇa avācaḥ hoti pharusa avācaḥ hoti samphappalāpī hoti abhijjhālu

original: hoti, byāpannacitto hoti, micchādiṭṭhi hoti.
analyzed: hoti byāpanna cittaḥ hoti micchā diṭṭhi hoti

original: Tasmā ‘na uccākulīnatā seyyaṁso’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: tasmai naḥ ucca akulīna tā seyyasaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Uccākulīnopi hi, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato
analyzed: ucca akulīnaḥ api hi brāhmaṇaḥ idha ekaccaḥ pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ hoti adinnādānā paṭivirato

original: hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya
analyzed: hoti kāmesum icchā ācārā paṭivirataḥ hoti musā vādā paṭivirataḥ hoti pisuṇāya vācāya

original: paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti,
analyzed: paṭivirataḥ hoti pharusāya vācāya paṭivirataḥ hoti samphappalāpā paṭivirataḥ hoti

original: anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti.
analyzed: an abhijjhālu hoti a byāpanna cittaḥ hoti sammādiṭṭhi hoti

original: Tasmā ‘na uccākulīnatā pāpiyaṁso’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: tasmai naḥ ucca akulīna tā pāpiyasaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Uḷāravaṇṇopi hi, brāhmaṇa …
analyzed: uḷāra vaṇṇaḥ api hi brāhmaṇa

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: uḷārabhogopi hi, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco pāṇātipātī hoti …
analyzed: uḷāra bhogaḥ upi hi brāhmaṇaḥ idha ekaccaḥ pāṇa atipātī hoti

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: micchādiṭṭhi hoti.
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi hoti

original: Tasmā ‘na uḷārabhogatā seyyaṁso’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: tasmai naḥ uḷāra bhoga tā seyyasaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Uḷārabhogopi hi, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe… sammādiṭṭhi hoti.
analyzed: uḷāra bhogaḥ api hi brāhmaṇaḥ idha ekaccaḥ pāṇātipātā paṭivirataḥ hoti pe sammādiṭṭhi hoti

original: Tasmā ‘na uḷārabhogatā pāpiyaṁso’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: tasmai naḥ uḷāra bhoga tā pāpiyasaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘sabbaṁ paricaritabban’ti vadāmi, na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ‘sabbaṁ na paricaritabban’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha brāhmaṇa sabbam paricaritabbanti vadāmi na pana āha brāhmaṇa sabbam na paricaritabbanti vadāmi

original: Yaṁ hissa, brāhmaṇa, paricarato pāricariyāhetu saddhā vaḍḍhati, sīlaṁ vaḍḍhati, sutaṁ vaḍḍhati, cāgo vaḍḍhati, paññā vaḍḍhati, tamahaṁ ‘paricaritabban’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: yam hi ssa brāhmaṇa paricarato pāricariyā hetu saddhā vaḍḍhati sīlam vaḍḍhati sutam vaḍḍhati cāgaḥ vaḍḍhati paññā vaḍḍhati tam aham paricaritabbanti vadāmi

original: Yaṁ hissa, brāhmaṇa, paricarato pāricariyāhetu na saddhā vaḍḍhati, na sīlaṁ vaḍḍhati,
analyzed: yam hi ssa brāhmaṇa paricarato pāricariyā hetu na saddhā vaḍḍhati na sīlam vaḍḍhati

original: na sutaṁ vaḍḍhati, na cāgo vaḍḍhati, na paññā vaḍḍhati, nāhaṁ taṁ ‘paricaritabban’ti vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: na sutam vaḍḍhati na cāgaḥ vaḍḍhati na paññā vaḍḍhati na aham tam paricaritabbanti vadāmi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, esukārī brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte esukārī brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “brāhmaṇā, bho gotama, cattāri dhanāni paññapenti—
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ bho gotama cattāri dhanāni paññapenti

original: brāhmaṇassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti, khattiyassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti, vessassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti, suddassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇassa sandhanam paññapenti khattiyassa sandhanam paññapenti vessassa sandhanam paññapenti suddassa sandhanam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti bhikkhācariyaṁ;
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ brāhmaṇassa sandhanam paññapenti bhikkhā cariya

original: bhikkhācariyañca pana brāhmaṇo sandhanaṁ atimaññamāno akiccakārī hoti gopova adinnaṁ ādiyamānoti.
analyzed: bhikkhā cariyam ca pana brāhmaṇaḥ sandhanam atimaññamānaḥ akicca kārī hoti gopā u va adinnam ādiyamānaḥ iti

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ brāhmaṇassa sandhanam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā khattiyassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti dhanukalāpaṁ;
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇā khattiyassa sandhanam paññapenti dhanu kalāpa

original: dhanukalāpañca pana khattiyo sandhanaṁ atimaññamāno akiccakārī hoti gopova adinnaṁ ādiyamānoti.
analyzed: pana khattiyaḥ sandhanam atimaññamānaḥ akicca kārī hoti gopāḥ u vā adinnam ādiyamānaḥ iti

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā khattiyassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ khattiyassa sandhanam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā vessassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti kasigorakkhaṁ;
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ vessassa sandhanam paññapenti kasi gorakkha

original: kasigorakkhañca pana vesso sandhanaṁ atimaññamāno akiccakārī hoti gopova adinnaṁ ādiyamānoti.
analyzed: kasi gorakkham ca pana vessaḥ sandhanam atimaññamānaḥ akicca kārī hoti gopā u vā adinnam ādiyamānaḥ iti

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā vessassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ vessassa sandhanam paññapenti

original: Tatridaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā suddassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti asitabyābhaṅgiṁ;
analyzed: bho gotama brāhmaṇā suddassa sandhanam paññapenti asita byābhaṅgi

original: asitabyābhaṅgiñca pana suddo sandhanaṁ atimaññamāno akiccakārī hoti gopova adinnaṁ ādiyamānoti.
analyzed: a sita byābhaṅgin ca pana suddaḥ sandhanam atimaññamānaḥ akicca kārī hoti gopā uva adinnam ādiyamānaḥ iti

original: Idaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā suddassa sandhanaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho bho gotama brāhmaṇāḥ suddassa sandhanam paññapenti

original: Brāhmaṇā, bho gotama, imāni cattāri dhanāni paññapenti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ bho gotama imāni cattāri dhanāni paññapenti

original: Idha bhavaṁ gotamo kimāhā”ti?
analyzed: bhavam gotamaḥ kim āha ati

original: “Kiṁ pana, brāhmaṇa, sabbo loko brāhmaṇānaṁ etadabbhanujānāti: ‘imāni cattāri dhanāni paññapentū’”ti?
analyzed: kim pana brāhmaṇa sabbaḥ lokaḥ brāhmaṇānaṃ etat abbhanujānāti imāni cattāri dhanāni paññapentu uti

original: “No hidaṁ, bho gotama”.
analyzed: na u hida bho gotama

original: “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, puriso daliddo assako anāḷhiyo. Tassa akāmassa bilaṁ olaggeyyuṁ: ‘idaṁ te, ambho purisa, maṁsaṁ khāditabbaṁ, mūlañca anuppadātabban’ti.
analyzed: seyyathā api brāhmaṇa purisaḥ daliddaḥ assakaḥ an āḷhiyaḥ tassa akāmassa bilam olaggeyyu idam te ambho purisa masam khāditabba mūlañca an uppadātabbanti

original: Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā appaṭiññāya tesaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ, atha ca panimāni cattāri dhanāni paññapenti.
analyzed: evam eva kho brāhmaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ a paṭiññāya tesam samaṇa brāhmaṇāna atha ca panimāni cattāri dhanāni paññapenti

original: Ariyaṁ kho ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ purisassa sandhanaṁ paññapemi.
analyzed: ariyam kho aha brāhmaṇa lokuttaram dhammam purisassa sandhanam paññapemi

original: Porāṇaṁ kho panassa mātāpettikaṁ kulavaṁsaṁ anussarato yattha yattheva attabhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti tena teneva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: porāṇam kho panassa mātāpettikam kula vasam anussarataḥ yattha yatthā iva atta bhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti tena tena iva saṅkhyam gacchati

original: Khattiyakule ce attabhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti ‘khattiyo’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: khattiya kule ce atta bhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti khattiyaḥ tvā iva saṅkhyam gacchati

original: brāhmaṇakule ce attabhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti ‘brāhmaṇo’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kule ce atta bhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti saṅkhyam gacchati

original: vessakule ce attabhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti ‘vesso’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: vessa kule ce atta bhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti vessaḥ utvā iva saṅkhyam gacchati

original: suddakule ce attabhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti ‘suddo’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: sudda kule ce atta bhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti suddo tvā iva saṅkhyam gacchati

original: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, yaṁyadeva paccayaṁ paṭicca aggi jalati tena teneva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.

original: Kaṭṭhañce paṭicca aggi jalati ‘kaṭṭhaggi’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: paṭicca aggi jalati kaṭṭhaggitvā iva saṅkhyam gacchati

original: sakalikañce paṭicca aggi jalati ‘sakalikaggi’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;

original: tiṇañce paṭicca aggi jalati ‘tiṇaggi’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;

original: gomayañce paṭicca aggi jalati ‘gomayaggi’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.

original: Evameva kho ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, ariyaṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ purisassa sandhanaṁ paññapemi.

analyzed: porāṇam kho panassa mātāpettikam kula vasam anussarataḥ yattha yatthā iva atta bhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti tena tena iva saṅkhyam gacchati

original: vessakule ce attabhāvassa abhinibbatti hoti ‘vesso’tveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;

analyzed: brāhmaṇa agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ hoti so ca tathāgata ppavedita
